trans-unit.source: Manages states and the logic for transitioning between states for controls.
trans-unit.target: Gere Estados e a lógica em transição entre os Estados de controlos.

trans-unit.source: The VisualStateManager enables you to specify states for a control, the appearance of a control when it is in a certain state, and when a control changes states.
trans-unit.target: O VisualStateManager permite-lhe especificar os Estados de um controlo, o aspeto de um controlo quando faz parte de um determinado Estado e, quando um controlo é alterado Estados.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> might have a slightly different appearance when it is pressed than when it is not pressed.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>pode ter um aspeto ligeiramente diferente quando é premido que quando não é premido.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: Two states that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> defines correspond to when it is pressed (`"Pressed"`) and when it is not (`"Normal"`).
trans-unit.target: Dois Estados que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>define correspondem ao quando é premido (`"Pressed"`) e quando não se encontra (`"Normal"`).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of a control when it is in a state is defined by a <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>.
trans-unit.target: O aspeto de um controlo quando está num estado é definido pela <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>.</xref:System.Windows.VisualState>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> objects that specify how the control's appearance changes when the control is in that state.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>contém uma coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>objetos que especificar como aspecto do controlo é alterada quando o controlo tem esse Estado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState>

trans-unit.source: You add visual states to a control by setting the `VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups` attached property on the control.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar Estados visual para um controlo, definindo o `VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups` ligado propriedade no controlo.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects that are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>contém uma coleção de <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>objetos que são mutuamente exclusivos.</xref:System.Windows.VisualState> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>

trans-unit.source: That is, the control is always in exactly one state of in each <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Ou seja, o controlo é sempre no Estado em cada <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> exatamente um

trans-unit.source: The VisualStateManager also enables you to specify when a control enters a specific state.
trans-unit.target: O VisualStateManager também lhe permite especificar quando um controlo entra num estado específico.

trans-unit.source: The method that you should call to change states depends on your scenario.
trans-unit.target: O método que deve chamar alterar Estados depende do seu cenário.

trans-unit.source: If you create a control that uses the VisualStateManager in its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, call the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se criar um controlo que utiliza o VisualStateManager no respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, chame o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToState%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to create controls that use the VisualStateManager, see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar controlos que utilizam o VisualStateManager, consulte [criação de um controlo que tem um aspeto personalizável](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you use the VisualStateManager outside of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> (for example, if you use a VisualStateManager in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UserControl> or in a single element), call the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToElementState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se utilizar o VisualStateManager fora de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>(por exemplo, se utilizar um VisualStateManager num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UserControl>ou num único elemento), chamar o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToElementState%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToElementState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.UserControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: In either case, the VisualStateManager performs the logic that is required to appropriately start and stop the storyboards that are associated with the involved state.
trans-unit.target: Em ambos os casos, o VisualStateManager efetua a lógica necessária para adequadamente iniciar e parar storyboards que estão associados com o estado envolvido.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that a control defines the states, `State1` and `State2`, each of which has a storyboard associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que um controlo define os Estados `State1` e `State2`, cada um dos quais tem um storyboard associado.

trans-unit.source: If the control is in `State1` and you pass `State2` to <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToState%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToElementState%2A>, the VisualStateManager starts the storyboard in `State2` and stops the storyboard in `State1`.
trans-unit.target: Se o controlo está em `State1` e passa `State2` para <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToState%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToElementState%2A>, o VisualStateManager inicia o guião gráfico principal no `State2` e interrompe a guião gráfico principal no `State1`.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToElementState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Controls that are included with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] use the VisualStateManager to change visual states.
trans-unit.target: Controlos que estão incluídos com [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] utilize o VisualStateManager para alterar os Estados de visual.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for a control that is included with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], you can add <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects to the control's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to specify the control's appearance in a certain state.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>para um controlo que está incluído no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], pode adicionar <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>objetos para o controlo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>para especificar o aspecto do controlo num determinado Estado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To find the names of the visual states for the controls that are included with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], see [Control Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para localizar os nomes dos Estados de visual para os controlos que estão incluídos com [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], consulte [estilos do controlo e modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The control's logic handles transitioning between states, so you do not need to do anything other than define the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects in the new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Os identificadores de lógica do controlo vão transitar entre Estados de, pelo que não necessita de fazer algo diferente de definem os <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>objetos no novo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to create control templates for existing controls, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar modelos de controlo para controlos existentes, consulte [personalizar o aspeto de um controlo existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you want to implement your own logic for transitioning between states, you must inherit from VisualStateManager, override the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToStateCore%2A> method, and set the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.CustomVisualStateManager%2A?displayProperty=fullName> attached property on the control that uses the custom logic.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender implementar a sua própria lógica para transição entre Estados, tem de herdar VisualStateManager, substitua o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToStateCore%2A>método e defina o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.CustomVisualStateManager%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ligado propriedade no controlo que utiliza a lógica personalizada.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.CustomVisualStateManager%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToStateCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateManager"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.CustomVisualStateManager*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.CustomVisualStateManager*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.CustomVisualStateManager*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.CustomVisualStateManager*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.CustomVisualStateManager*>ligado propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.CustomVisualStateManager*>

trans-unit.source: The element to get the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.CustomVisualStateManager*> attached property from.
trans-unit.target: O elemento para obter o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.CustomVisualStateManager*>anexado a propriedade de.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.CustomVisualStateManager*>

trans-unit.source: The visual state manager that transitions between the states of a control.
trans-unit.target: O Gestor de estado visual que faz a transição entre os Estados de um controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> ligado propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The element to get the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> attached property from.
trans-unit.target: O elemento para obter o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> anexado a propriedade do.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup"></xref> objects that is associated with the specified object.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup"> </xref> objetos que estão associados com o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Transitions the element between two states.
trans-unit.target: Passa o elemento entre dois Estados.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to transition states that are defined by an application, rather than defined by a control.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para Estados de transição que são definidos por uma aplicação, em vez de definidas por um controlo.

trans-unit.source: Call the GoToElementState method to change states on an element outside of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> (for example, if you use a <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> in a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> or <xref:System.Windows.Window>).
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método GoToElementState para alterar os Estados de um elemento fora de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>(por exemplo, se utilizar um <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>num <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>ou <xref:System.Windows.Window>).</xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToState%2A> method if you are changing states in a control that uses the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> in its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToState%2A>método se estiver a alterar os Estados de um controlo que utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>no respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The root element that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de raiz que contenha o <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The state to transition to.
trans-unit.target: O estado de transição para.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use a <xref href="System.Windows.VisualTransition"></xref> object to transition between states; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para utilizar um <xref href="System.Windows.VisualTransition"> </xref> objeto a transição entre Estados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control successfully transitioned to the new state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controlo transferidas com êxito para o novo Estado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: stateGroupsRoot is .
trans-unit.target: stateGroupsRootis .

trans-unit.source: -or- stateName is .
trans-unit.target: -or- stateName is .

trans-unit.source: Transitions the control between two states.
trans-unit.target: Passa o controlo entre dois Estados.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to transition states on control that has a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para Estados de transição de controlo que tenha um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call the GoToState method if you are changing states in a control that uses the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> in its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método de GoToState se estiver a alterar os Estados de um controlo que utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>no respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToElementState%2A> method to change states on an element outside of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> (for example, if you use a <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UserControl> or in a single element).
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToElementState%2A>método alterar Estados num elemento fora de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>(por exemplo, se utilizar um <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UserControl>ou num único elemento).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.UserControl> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToElementState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control to transition between states.
trans-unit.target: O controlo a transição entre Estados.

trans-unit.source: The state to transition to.
trans-unit.target: O estado de transição para.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use a <xref href="System.Windows.VisualTransition"></xref> object to transition between states; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para utilizar um <xref href="System.Windows.VisualTransition"> </xref> objeto a transição entre Estados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control successfully transitioned to the new state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controlo transferidas com êxito para o novo Estado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: control is .
trans-unit.target: controlis .

trans-unit.source: -or- stateName is .
trans-unit.target: -or- stateName is .

trans-unit.source: Transitions a control between states.
trans-unit.target: Passa um controlo entre Estados.

trans-unit.source: The GoToStateCore method performs the logic necessary to appropriately start and stop the storyboards that are associated with a transition.
trans-unit.target: O método GoToStateCore efetua a lógica necessária para adequadamente iniciar e parar storyboards que estão associados uma transição.

trans-unit.source: When a control calls <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToState%2A> to change its state, the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> does the following: - First, if the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> that the control is transitioning to has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the storyboard begins.
trans-unit.target: Quando um controlo chama <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToState%2A>para alterar o respetivo estado, o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>faz o seguinte: - primeiro, se o <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>tem o controlo está a mudar para um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, começa a storyboard.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, if the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> that the control is coming from has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the storyboard ends.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, se o <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>tem que o controlo é proveniente de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, as extremidades de guião gráfico principal.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState>

trans-unit.source: - If the control is already in the `stateName` state, <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToState%2A> takes no action and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: -Se o controlo já está a ser o `stateName` Estado, <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToState%2A>não utiliza nenhuma ação e devolve `true`.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToState%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If `stateName` does not exist in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of `control`, <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToState%2A> takes no action and returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: -Se `stateName` não existe no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>de `control`, <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToState%2A>não utiliza nenhuma ação e devolve `false`.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: You can implement your own <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> to provide different logic for transitioning between states.
trans-unit.target: Pode implementar a sua própria <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>para fornecer a lógica diferente para transição entre Estados.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can change the logic described previously, or you can provide logic to transition between custom animation types.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode alterar a lógica descrita anteriormente ou pode fornecer a lógica para transição entre os tipos de animação personalizada.

trans-unit.source: To implement a <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>, create a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> and override the GoToStateCore method.
trans-unit.target: Para implementar um <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>, crie uma classe que herda de <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>e substitua o método GoToStateCore.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>

trans-unit.source: To use the custom class, set the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.CustomVisualStateManager%2A> property to an object of your custom type.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar a classe personalizada, defina o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.CustomVisualStateManager%2A>propriedade para um objeto do seu tipo personalizado.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.CustomVisualStateManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control to transition between states.
trans-unit.target: O controlo a transição entre Estados.

trans-unit.source: The root element that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de raiz que contenha o <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the state to transition to.
trans-unit.target: O nome do Estado para transição para.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup"></xref> that the state belongs to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup"> </xref> que pertence o estado.

trans-unit.source: The representation of the state to transition to.
trans-unit.target: A representação do Estado para transição para.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use a <xref href="System.Windows.VisualTransition"></xref> object to transition between states; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para utilizar um <xref href="System.Windows.VisualTransition"> </xref> objeto a transição entre Estados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control successfully transitioned to the new state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controlo transferidas com êxito para o novo Estado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanging"></xref> event on the specified <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanging"> </xref> evento especificado <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> is set on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a control, the `control` parameter is set to the control that owns <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>está definido no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>de um controlo, o `control` parâmetro está definido como o controlo que é proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> is set on a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, `control` is `null` and you should use the `stateGroupsRoot` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>está definido num <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, `control` é `null` e deve utilizar o `stateGroupsRoot` parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>

trans-unit.source: The object that the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanging"></xref> event occurred on.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que o <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanging"> </xref> evento ocorreu no.

trans-unit.source: The state that the control is transitioning from.
trans-unit.target: O estado de que o controlo é transição do.

trans-unit.source: The state that the control is transitioning to.
trans-unit.target: O estado está a mudar para o controlo.

trans-unit.source: The control that is transitioning states.
trans-unit.target: O controlo que está a mudar Estados.

trans-unit.source: The root element that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de raiz que contenha o <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: stateGroupsRoot is .
trans-unit.target: stateGroupsRootis .

trans-unit.source: -or- newState is .
trans-unit.target: -or- newState is .

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanging"></xref> event on the specified <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanging"> </xref> evento especificado <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> is set on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a control, the `control` parameter is set to the control that owns <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>está definido no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>de um controlo, o `control` parâmetro está definido como o controlo que é proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> is set on a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, `control` is `null` and you should use the `stateGroupsRoot` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>está definido num <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, `control` é `null` e deve utilizar o `stateGroupsRoot` parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>

trans-unit.source: The object that the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanging"></xref> event occurred on.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que o <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanging"> </xref> evento ocorreu no.

trans-unit.source: The state that the control is transitioning from.
trans-unit.target: O estado de que o controlo é transição do.

trans-unit.source: The state that the control is transitioning to.
trans-unit.target: O estado está a mudar para o controlo.

trans-unit.source: The control that is transitioning states.
trans-unit.target: O controlo que está a mudar Estados.

trans-unit.source: The root element that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de raiz que contenha o <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: stateGroupsRoot is .
trans-unit.target: stateGroupsRootis .

trans-unit.source: -or- newState is .
trans-unit.target: -or- newState is .

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.CustomVisualStateManager*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.CustomVisualStateManager*>ligado propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.CustomVisualStateManager*>

trans-unit.source: The object to set the property on.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para definir a propriedade no.

trans-unit.source: The visual state manager that transitions between the states of a control.
trans-unit.target: O Gestor de estado visual que faz a transição entre os Estados de um controlo.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups*>
